name: Lux Body Wash, Fragrant Skin
description: Lux Magical Spell bodywash is created with the intoxicating fragrance of black orchids and the skin rejuvenating properties of Juniper oil. Bathe your skin in this fine fragrance bodywash to experience a rejuvenating, superior sensory bathing experience.  Gives you softer and smoother skin. Exclusive fine fragrance only found in bodywash. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
